Detailed Description

An abstract dispencer useful when each individual can be in only one parallel branch, so the distribute method is exclusive.
The only method to implement is distribute(Individual) to specify the branch number in which store the specified Individual.

Note: the predistribute method of this class has empty implementation. Override it if you need to evaluate preDistrubute statistics.

Parameters:
<T> The class chromosomes flowing across the stage.
Version:
1.2
Since:
1.0
See also:
jenes.stage.Parallel

Member Function Documentation

final void jenes.stage.ExclusiveDispenser< T extends Chromosome >.distribute ( Population< T >  in,
Population< T >[]  branches 
)

Distributes the specified population between those ones in the specified array. If some populations within inStagePop are not empty they will contain the initial individuals too at the end of distribute operation.

The branch in which each individual is dispatched is given by the jenes.stage.ExclusiveDispenser#distribute(Individual) method

Parameters:
in the population to be distributed
branches the array of sub populations of the initial one

abstract int jenes.stage.ExclusiveDispenser< T extends Chromosome >.distribute ( Individual< T >  ind  )  [pure virtual]

Returns the branch number where to add the specified individual. Branches are numbered from 0 to span-1

Parameters:
ind the individual to distribute
Returns:
the branch number where to add the individual

final void jenes.stage.ExclusiveDispenser< T extends Chromosome >.mergePopulation ( Population< T >[]  branches,
Population< T >  out 
)

Merges the populations within the specified array in the specified one. If population is not empty it will contain the initial individuals too at the end of merge operation.

Note: if out have a different size than the input population used in the jenes.stage.ExclusiveDispenser#distribute(Population, Population[]) method out will be resized to fit the input population size.

Parameters:
out the final population
branches the populations to be merged

void jenes.stage.ExclusiveDispenser< T extends Chromosome >.preDistribute ( Population< T >  population  ) 

Callback method invoked just before distribution of individuals begins. By default this method does nothing. It an be overriden in order to perform custom operations.

Parameters:
population the population to distribute

void jenes.stage.ExclusiveDispenser< T extends Chromosome >.postDistribute ( Population< T >[]  branches  ) 

Callback method invoked just after distribution of individuals is done. By default this method does nothing. It an be overriden in order to perform custom operations.

Parameters:
branches populations as distributed

void jenes.stage.ExclusiveDispenser< T extends Chromosome >.preMerge ( Population< T >[]  branches  ) 

Callback method invoked just before merge of branches begins. By default this method does nothing. It an be overriden in order to perform custom operations.

Parameters:
branches populations as resulting from the different branches

void jenes.stage.ExclusiveDispenser< T extends Chromosome >.postMerge ( Population< T >  population  ) 

Callback method invoked just after merge of individuals is done. By default this method does nothing. It an be overriden in order to perform custom operations.

Parameters:
